detaileddescription.para: Configures input hysteresis mode of pin. Use type XMC_GPIO_INPUT_HYSTERESIS_t for this enum. Selecting the appropriate pad hysteresis allows optimized pad oscillation behavior for touch-sensing applications.
No internal pull device active; Pn_OUTx continuously samples the input value
Inverted no internal pull device active
Inverted no internal pull device active;Pn_OUTx continuously samples the input value

Defines the direction and characteristics of a pin. Use type XMC_GPIO_MODE_t for this enum. For the operation with alternate functions, the port pins are directly connected to input or output functions of the on-chip periphery.

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_GPIO_PORT_t *const port, const uint8_t pin, const XMC_GPIO_INPUT_HYSTERESIS_t hysteresis)
memberdef.name: XMC_GPIO_SetInputHysteresis

parameterdescription.para: Constant pointer pointing to GPIO port, to access hardware register Pn_PHCR.
input hysteresis selection. Refer data structure XMC_GPIO_INPUT_HYSTERESIS_t for details.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Sets port pin input hysteresis. It configures hardware registers Pn_PHCR.hysteresis is initially configured during initialization in XMC_GPIO_Init(). Call this API to alter pad hysteresis as needed later in the program.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Prior to this api, user has to configure port pin to input mode using XMC_GPIO_SetMode().
